title: 7-up font
content:
I'm looking for the 7-up font, I believe it's Poppl-Laudatio but I'm not 100% sure.  
thank you in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [7uP-logo original.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120913062330/http:/typophile.com/files/7uP-logo%20original.jpg) | 592.24 KB |
author: notreally

comments.content:
That’s custom, close(ish) is Friz Quadrata or Albertus for the stemmed U but the 7 is more like Newtext. If you need the logo you can probably find it here  
 [http://brandsoftheworld.com/search/?query\_id=3216640&page=2&mtype=&brand...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120913062330/http:/brandsoftheworld.com/search/?query_id=3216640&page=2&mtype=&brand_id=93877 "http://brandsoftheworld.com/search/?query\_id=3216640&page=2&mtype=&brand\_id=93877")

Tim
